summary.para: The number of the disk that contains this extent.
This is the same number that is used to construct the name of the disk, for example, the X in "\\?\PhysicalDriveX" or "\\?\\HarddiskX".

member.name: DISK_EXTENT.StartingOffset
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the disk to the extent, in bytes.

member.name: DISK_EXTENT.ExtentLength
member.summary: The number of bytes in this extent.
